mapper.select: select PHOTO_ID as "id", DT as "date", LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, PERSON as "personId", RAWTAGS, SMALLURL, TITLE, VIEWED from ( select t.* from FLICKR_DE_WEST_TABLE t, FLICKR_DE_WEST_TABLE_GEOM g where t.PHOTO_ID = g.PHOTO_ID and g.CLUSTER_R${radius}_ID = #{areaid} and t.dt >= to_date(#{queryStr}, #{oracleDatePatternStr}) and t.dt < to_date(#{queryStr}, #{oracleDatePatternStr}) + interval '1' ${queryLevel} order by t.dt desc ) where rownum <= #{num}
